item.title: Fire in Strasbourg, France Data Center
item.content:encoded: OVH Announcement: We are currently facing a major incident in our DataCenter of Strasbourg. If your production is in Strasbourg, we recommend to activate your Disaster Recovery Plan. Detailed information http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49484

item.title: Fire in Strasbourg, France Data Center
item.content:encoded:
--- title: Canada Host 4 network issues date: '2021-03-11T20:04:36.730Z' severity: partial-outage affectedsystems:

  • vps-ca resolved: false

Host 4 started to show significant packet loss. After a reboot, it does not come online again. Hard reboot times out. IPMI times out. An OVH technician is already working on the rack.

item.title: Reboot Host 5
item.content:encoded: Reboot Host 5 to fix bugged cgroups.
